医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
彻底改变疾病预测：MILTON 框架利用生物库数据集识别 3,213 种疾病通过整合多组学数据，MILTON 改进了疾病预测和生物标志物识别，推动了预防医学和诊断领域的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Revolutionizing-disease-prediction-MILTON-framework-utilizes-biobank-datasets-to-identify-3213-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Revolutionizing-disease-prediction-MILTON-framework-utilizes-biobank-datasets-to-identify-3213-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b0b8f32-806c-4e6d-b400-a88b0f3cf69c Tue, 17 Sep 2024 05:55:00 -0400 Revolutionizing disease prediction: MILTON framework utilizes biobank datasets to identify 3,213 diseases
密歇根州老年人大麻使用趋势研究表明，老年密歇根人的大麻使用量激增，强调了健康益处、驾驶风险以及提供者沟通的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Trends-in-cannabis-use-among-older-adults-in-Michigan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Trends-in-cannabis-use-among-older-adults-in-Michigan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61482a7d-33ce-47eb-89fd-88f20a51a942 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 05:13:00 -0400 Trends in cannabis use among older adults in Michigan
动物奶和植物奶如何影响肠道健康？研究人员发现，与植物性替代品相比，动物奶支持更丰富、更多样化的肠道微生物群，这有时可能会助长有害细菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/How-do-animal-and-plant-based-milks-affect-gut-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/How-do-animal-and-plant-based-milks-affect-gut-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6728c5b1-1be0-4170-9dd7-3b29a7e85c26 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 01:15:00 -0400 How do animal and plant-based milks affect gut health?
INTEGRA Biosciences 的移液器为表观遗传学测试铺平了道路Genknowme 是一家专门从事表观遗传学研究的初创公司，已将 INTEGRA Biosciences 的多通道移液器集成到其液体处理工作流程中。这些液体处理解决方案将使实验室能够提供快速的表观遗传评估，从而支持医疗保健专业人员建议改变生活方式，以改善患者的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-pipettes-pave-the-way-for-epigenics-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-pipettes-pave-the-way-for-epigenics-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f21a063e-ff8b-42a3-9c1b-18ffba27b41d Tue, 17 Sep 2024 01:06:00 -0400 INTEGRA Biosciences’ pipettes pave the way for epigenetics testing
Newcells Biotech 推出高内涵、高通量成像套件以推进临床前药物开发项目Newcells Biotech（“Newcells”）是一家领先的药物发现合作伙伴，专门开发体外模型和定制化验服务，以改善人体体内结果的预测，今天宣布推出其成像套件和先进的肺成纤维细胞-肌成纤维细胞转变（FMT）测定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Newcells-Biotech-launches-high-content-and-high-throughput-imaging-suite-to-advance-pre-clinical-drug-development-programmes。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Newcells-Biotech-launches-high-content-and-high-throughput-imaging-suite-to-advance-pre-clinical-drug-development-programmes。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e8729d9-375f-4e72-a464-c8a20338f764 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 01:06:00 -0400 Newcells Biotech launches high-content and high-throughput imaging suite to advance pre-clinical drug development programmes
LabVantage 被 Frost & Sullivan 评为年度全球 LIMS 公司LabVantage Solutions, Inc. 是实验室信息学解决方案和服务（包括能够以较低成本快速部署的专用 LIMS 平台）的领先提供商，今天宣布该公司荣获全球实验室信息管理系统 (Global Laboratory Information Management Systems) 颁发的享有盛誉的年度公司奖 (Company of the Year Award)。 Frost & Sullivan 的 LIMS）行业。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/LabVantage-named-Global-LIMS-Company-of-the-year-by-Frost-Sullivan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/LabVantage-named-Global-LIMS-Company-of-the-year-by-Frost-Sullivan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d6f7c6d-1132-404f-9be6-e6a7e9767281 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 01:06:00 -0400 LabVantage named Global LIMS Company of the year by Frost & Sullivan
研究称认知扭曲和故意无知导致拒绝接种 COVID-19 疫苗研究人员发现，故意的无知和认知扭曲导致人们拒绝接种 COVID-19 疫苗，这强调了制定量身定制的沟通策略的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Cognitive- Distortions-and-deliberate-ignorance-lead-to-COVID-19-vaccine-refusal-study-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Cognitive- Distortions-and-deliberate-ignorance-lead-to-COVID-19-vaccine-refusal-study-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d10ac78-cb1c-4f7c-a5e8-00aa4c215c3e Tue, 17 Sep 2024 00:47:00 -0400 Cognitive distortions and deliberate ignorance lead to COVID-19 vaccine refusal, study says
MicrosensDx 与帝国理工学院研究人员合作开发突破性脓毒症测试MicrosensDx 很高兴地宣布，它正在与伦敦帝国理工学院的 Mayr Group 合作开发一种新型生物标志物测试，用于早期识别脓毒症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/MicrosensDx-collaborates-with-Imperial-researchers-to-develop-groundwriting-sepsis-test.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/MicrosensDx-collaborates-with-Imperial-researchers-to-develop-groundwriting-sepsis-test.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=afafb38e-45a5-46ad-9823-1b007301a92d Tue, 17 Sep 2024 00:28:00 -0400 MicrosensDx collaborates with Imperial researchers to develop groundbreaking sepsis test
营养和端粒动态如何塑造女性的美丽和衰老研究探索了女性健康、美丽和衰老之间的复杂关系，强调端粒动态和营养在促进长寿和活力方面的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/How-nutrition-and-telomere-dynamics-shape-beauty-and-aging-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/How-nutrition-and-telomere-dynamics-shape-beauty-and-aging-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b2042e3-f297-43b5-85ef-7f07db0833d9 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 00:14:00 -0400 How nutrition and telomere dynamics shape beauty and aging in women
突破性的代谢组衰老评分比传统方法更好地预测死亡率研究人员使用核磁共振生物标志物开发了代谢组学衰老评分，与其他衰老指标相比，该评分可以更准确地预测短期死亡率和疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Breakthrough-metabolomic-aging-score-that-predicts-mortality-better-than-traditional-methods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Breakthrough-metabolomic-aging-score-that-predicts-mortality-better-than-traditional-methods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc72fb58-5b11-460f-a9d0-bba8f7d22049 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 23:46:00 -0400 Breakthrough metabolomic aging score that predicts mortality better than traditional methods
